agreement: By clicking {{button}}, you acknowledge that you have read and understood, and agree to Teamconstructor's Terms and Privacy Policy
forgot_explanation: Enter the Email that you provided during registration. You will receive an email with a link to change your password to this mailbox

need_to_confirm_email: You have created a temporary account. After confirming the email, it will become permanent. To confirm the email, go to the mailbox that you indicated during registration and follow the link in the letter
